page.title: 15Transport and Employment
page.content:
{] {Occupation Place of Employment Clerkess Fraserburgh Hairdresser Fraserburgh Shop Assistant St.Combs Filleter Fraserburgh Joiner St.Combs Farmworker Coralhill
Of nine houses in West Park in the village of{St Combs,}six people had jobs and three were at home.Only two people actually worked in the village itself.This reflects the general trend in the village as there are a couple of shops,a chip shop,a joiner,a motor mechanic,a hotel and the school.Most people work in either,{Fraserburgh, {Peterhead}or the sorrounding area.If they work outside the village they travel mostly by bus or car.
